description: Great apartment located right across the street from Central Park. 2 bedrooms with full-size beds and a futon that folds out to become a full sized bed. The apartment has all the amenities you'll need during your visit to the city including WiFi, full kitchen, and more There is a balcony with a great view of Central Park and Manhattan.
name: Big Apartment with Balcony by Central Park
review: Had a good time , communication was great . Definitely would come back .
